title: The Judge: Even Trump Knows He Can’t Achieve All His Immigration Goals | Alan Colmes Radio Show
text: Tuesday on "The Alan Colmes Show," Alan spoke with Fox Senior Judicial Analyst Judge Andrew Napolitano about the position paper Donald Trump issued over the weekend about how to handle the immigration issue in America. The Judge told Alan that Donald Trump's disparagement of the 14
